# Local Notes MCP: Quick Start ðŸš€

## 1. MCP Instructions (AI Agent Usage)

Connect this app to your AI assistant (Claude, Cursor, etc.) to give it long-term memory!

1. Go to **Settings** (âš™ï¸ gear icon in top right).
2. Select the **MCP** tab.
3. Click **Copy Config** to get the configuration JSON.
4. Paste this config into your AI agent's MCP settings file.

**Try this prompt:**
> "Summarize what we have achieved so far into a note using mcp"

---

## 2. Main Features

- **Group By**: Organize notes by date or other fields.
- **Favorites**: Star important notes to keep them at the top.
- **Edit / Preview**: Toggle between Markdown editing and preview mode.
- **Export / Import**: Backup your notes to JSON or migrate them.

---

## 3. Markdown Quick Reference

| Element | Syntax | Result |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Headers** | `# H1`, `## H2` | Big, Medium |
| **Bold/Italic** | `**Bold**`, `*Italic*` | **Bold**, *Italic* |
| **Links** | `[Text](url)` | [Text](url) |
| **Lists** | `- Item`, `1. Item` | Bullets, Numbers |
| **Checklist** | `- [ ] Todo` | â˜‘ Todo |
| **Blockquote** | `> Quote` | > Quote |

### General Text Example

**Source:**
````
# Main Title
## Subtitle
- Bullet point 1
- Bullet point 2
  - Nested item
1. Numbered item
2. Another item

[Link to Google](https://google.com)
**Bold Text** and *Italic Text*
````

**Result:**
# Main Title
## Subtitle
- Bullet point 1
- Bullet point 2
  - Nested item
1. Numbered item
2. Another item

[Link to Google](https://google.com)
**Bold Text** and *Italic Text*

### Table Example

**Source:**
````
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
| :--- | :--- |
| Row 1 Col 1 | Row 1 Col 2 |
| Row 2 Col 1 | Row 2 Col 2 |
````

**Result:**
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
| :--- | :--- |
| Row 1 Col 1 | Row 1 Col 2 |
| Row 2 Col 1 | Row 2 Col 2 |

### Code Block Example

**Source:**
````
```javascript
console.log("Hello World");
```
````

**Result:**
```javascript
console.log("Hello World");
```

### Diagram Example

**Source:**
````
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Start] --> B{Decide}
    B -->|Yes| C[Do It]
    B -->|No| D[Stop]
```
````

**Result:**
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Start] --> B{Decide}
    B -->|Yes| C[Do It]
    B -->|No| D[Stop]
```

# Admin Guide ðŸ›¡ï¸

Since you are an administrator, you have access to special features in the **Settings > Users** tab.

## 1. Impersonating Users ðŸŽ­
You can view the application exactly as another user sees it.
- Go to **Settings > Users**.
- Click the **Impersonate** button next to a user.
- You will be switched to their account.
- To exit, click the **Revert** button in the top banner.

## 2. Managing Users ðŸ‘¥
- **Edit**: Click the pencil icon to change a username or password.
- **Delete**: Click the trash icon to remove a user (and their notes).
- **Merge**: You can merge notes from one user to another.

## 3. Backup & Restore ðŸ’¾
Proactively save your data!
- **Backup**: Go to **Settings > Admin** and click **Download Database**.
- **Restore**: Upload a `.db` file to replace the current database.
  > âš ï¸ **Warning**: Restoring will overwrite all current data!
